thread.title: BRIEF-Boe Varitronix Expects To Record Decrease In Net Profit For FY2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Boe Varitronix Expects To Record Decrease In Net Profit For FY2017
text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Boe Varitronix Ltd:
* EXPECTED TO RECORD A SIGNIFICANT DECREASE IN NET PROFIT FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO INTENSE COMPETITION IN THIN FILM TRANSISTOR
* ‍EXPECTED TO RECORD A SIGNIFICANT DECREASE IN FY NET PROFIT BY ABOUT 60%​
* -EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO INTENSE COMPETITION IN THIN FILM TRANSISTOR MARKET (ADDS DROPPED WORD “MARKET”) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
